title: Currant and walnut orange drizzle cake
ingredients: ['225g butter', '200g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '250ml soured cream', '250g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '160g currants', '60g walnuts', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 tablespoons orange zest', '60ml orange juice', '100g caster sugar']
